alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:41PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison, northern Franklin, eastern Carroll, Crawford, northwestern Sebastian, Washington, eastern Sequoyah and southern Adair Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1041 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Roberson Hollow to 8 miles southeast of Stilwell. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Fayetteville... Van Buren... Berryville... Stilwell... Huntsville... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Farmington... Alma... Prairie Grove... Muldrow... Roland... Green Forest... Elkins... West Fork... Lincoln... Mulberry... Greenland... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 22. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 319 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington
